extendedIngredients.name: cabbage
extendedIngredients.original: 1 head cabbage, cored and coarsely chopped

extendedIngredients.name: salt and pepper
extendedIngredients.original: 1 pinch salt and pepper to taste

title: Fabulous Fried Cabbage
summary: Fabulous Fried Cabbage requires approximately 50 minutes from start to finish. This recipe serves 6. One serving contains 53 calories, 2g of protein, and 2g of fat. For 47 cents per serving, this recipe covers 12% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Not a lot of people really liked this side dish. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. If you have butter, salt and pepper, chicken broth, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, fodmap friendly, and vegetarian diet. It is brought to you by Allrecipes. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 50%, which is pretty good. Similar recipes include Zucchini Chips: Fried Up Fabulous, Fried Chicken with Beer â€“ beer adds a very flavorful and earthly taste to so many things. Fried chicken with beer is fabulous, and Cabbage Thoran (Kerala Style Stir-Fried Cabbage).
instructions: Bring the butter and chicken broth to a boil in a large skillet. Reduce heat to low and add the cabbage. Cover and cook over low heat to steam the cabbage for about 45 minutes, stirring frequently, or until cabbage is tender and sweet. Season with salt and pepper and serve.                                                Kitchen-Friendly View

steps.step: Bring the butter and chicken broth to a boil in a large skillet. Reduce heat to low and add the cabbage. Cover and cook over low heat to steam the cabbage for about 45 minutes, stirring frequently, or until cabbage is tender and sweet. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
